        public boolean cutStrings(java.lang.String items)
        Splits the items from user's input to single items.

      • makeIntoItems

        public boolean makeIntoItems(java.lang.String item)
        Searches the item for the amount and the name.
        Parameters:
        item - is a single item from the user input.

      • checkDuplicates

        public boolean checkDuplicates(int amount,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the item exists on the list.
        Parameters:
        amount - is the amount of items to be added to/removed from the list.
        name - is the name of the item to be added to/removed from the list.
        Returns:
        true if duplicate is found, otherwise false.
